public class UserNotFoundException extends Exception { // è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¼‚å¸¸
  public UserNotFoundException() {
    super();
  }

  public UserNotFoundException(String message) {
    super(message);
  }

  public UserNotFoundException(String message, Throwable e) {
    super(message, e);
  }
}

public class UserService {
  private UserRepository userRepo;
  public UserService(UseRepository userRepo) {
    this.userRepo = userRepo;
  }

  public User getUserById(long userId) throws UserNotFoundException {
    User user = userRepo.findUserById(userId);
    if (user == null) { // throwç”¨æ¥æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸
      throw new UserNotFoundException();//ä»£ç ä»æ­¤å¤„è¿”å›
    }
    return user;
  }
}

public class UserController {
  private UserService userService;
  public UserController(UserService userService) {
    this.userService = userService;
  }
  
  public User getUserById(long userId) {
    User user = null;
    try { //æ•è·å¼‚å¸¸
      user = userService.getUserById(userId);
    } catch (UserNotFoundException e) {
      System.out.println("User not found: " + userId);
    } finally { //ä¸ç®¡å¼‚å¸¸ä¼šä¸ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿï¼ŒfinallyåŒ…è£¹çš„è¯­å¥å—æ€»ä¼šè¢«æ‰§è¡Œ
      System.out.println("I am always printed.");
    }
    return user;
  }
}
